name: KevinAxoda
body:
Dear Sir/Madam, 
We are now working with new quality fabric and new print for SS20 collection program: - 
TEX TRADE has been established since 2004 on keeping the vision of Quality Insure Garments Exporter from Bangladesh. Below points for your kind reference: – 
 
For more details pls visit us : https://textradebd.com/ 
 
Our Export Product Item :- 
T – SHIRT, SWEATERS, SHIRT, JEANS PANTS, FLEECE Jackets, Padding JACKET, POLO Shirts, SWEAT Shirts, Night Ware, Underwear, Shorts, Pullovers, Pant, Pajamas Set, Trousers, BABY Ware, Baby Body SUITS, Boxer Shorts, Briefs, Tank Tops, LADIES Tops, Also CAPS and JUTE BAG, 
 
We are looking for your kind cooperation, 
 
Pls kindly confirm, 
 
Best regards, 
 
Shanto.
